name: Powershell ChromeLoader Browser Hijacker
description: Detects PowerShell process spawning a 'chrome.exe' process with the 'load-extension' flag to start a new chrome instance with custom extensions, as seen being used in 'ChromeLoader'
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\chrome.exe AND process.parent.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:*\-\-load\-extension\=* AND process.command_line:*\\AppData\\Local\\*)`
